data.title: GameSpy: The Collective
data.meta_description: The Collective at GameSpy - View The Collective profile, all the games created and published by The Collective plus news about their latest games.
data.text:
Founded in early 1997 by veteran game developers, The Collective was a development studio formerly based in Newport Beach, California.

The Collective merged with Shiny Entertainment in October of 2007 (since both studios were under the Foundation 9 umbrella) and now the single combined studio operates under a new name.

Video Music Awards to Include Videogame Tunes

MTV announces new videogame music categories for its award show.

The Da Vinci Code

Fans of The Da Vinci Code finally get to crack the code for themselves. But as the saying goes, some mysteries are better left unsolved.
